settings.title: Got acne prone or oily skin?
settings.text:
Take advantage of our limited time offer.

Receive a FREE 25ml Serum when you purchase a 50ml Clearing Serum or a 15ml Spot Treatment.

settings.title: 4 Weeks Extra Product FREE
settings.text: Receive a FREE Mini Clearing Serum when you purchase a Clearing Serum or Spot Treatment. That's an extra month's worth of product. T's & C's Apply.
settings.alternate-title: THE SKIN WITHIN - YOU'RE ALMOST THERE!
settings.alternate-text: You can only access your FREE 6 week Skin Within Program after making a purchase on site.

settings.text: Vegan & cruelty free
Fights blemishes, soothes irritated skin & controls excess oils
No harsh ingredients & gentle on the skin
Anti-aging, anti-pollutant & boost skin's hydration
Proudly Australian

settings.title: What is the Clearing Serum?
settings.text: The Clearing Serum is a one-step serum, designed for everyday use on acne prone skin. It restores your skin’s ecosystem naturally and is a triple threat against bacteria, irritated skin and excess oils.

settings.title: What is the Spot Treatment
settings.text: The fast acting Spot Treatment is designed to effectively attack stubborn spots that may pop up. The formula contains triple the amount of our man-made active ingredient, 5Beta-Scymnol. It dives deep to normalise oil production and attack blemishes at the source.

settings.title: How do I use these products?
settings.text:
We recommend still using your current cleanser prior to applying your Skin Shark Clearing Serum twice a day, morning and night. Our serum is packed with ingredients that are hydrating to the skin which means this product is suitable to replace your daily moisturiser if needed. 

The Spot Treatment can be added into your current routine. Apply gel to each blemish or effected areas two to three times per day.

settings.title: How long will it take to clear my skin?
settings.text:
We all have different skin and will therefore see different results. 

For optimum results we recommend sticking to your new routine for a minimum of 6 weeks.

settings.title: What active ingredients are in the product?
settings.text: Skin Shark is an ethical, vegan skin treatment packed full of powerful skin loving antioxidants. Led by our patented, proprietary ingredient 5Beta-Scymnol, it also contains Totarol, D Panthenol, Bakuchiol and Contacticel.

settings.title: "Within the first few weeks, I noticed that all my old pimples had started to clear"
settings.subtitle: Imogen - Concern: Cheeks, Chin, Forehead
settings.text: "While I was excited to use The Skin Shark products, I was a bit worried that if it didn't work I would feel a bit exhausted from trying so many products. Within the first few weeks of using The Skin Shark I noticed that all my old pimples had started to clear." - Imogen

settings.title: "The Skin Shark feels amazing"
settings.subtitle: Tison. Concern: Face & Shoulders
settings.text: "The Skin Shark feels amazing. I have really dry and oily skin and I didn't see any major results straight away. But if you use product consistently, The Skin Shark works - you just gotta keep using it." - Tison

settings.title: "I had no expectations for it to work"
settings.subtitle: Kayla - Concern: Cheeks & Chin
settings.text: "When I first started using The Skin Shark, I had no expectations for it to work. But overall I was pretty pleased with the results that I got. The product felt very hydrating on my skin, lightweight and moisturising" - Kayla
Designed for everyday use, the Clearing Serum is a triple threat against bacteria, irritated skin & excess oils.
A fast acting Spot Treatment that is designed to effectively treat stubborn spots and pimples.

settings.social-video-title: BIG results with the Spot Treatment

settings.title: Shark's join the fight against acne
settings.text: Over the past 400 million years, sharks’ immune systems have evolved to become free radical fighting machines. Their bile salts are one the most potent free radical fighters in the living world. It was this discovery that led The Skin Shark team to create a breakthrough man-made and cruelty free ingredient that would change the lives of those suffering acne-prone skin forever.

settings.preTitle: A BREAKTHROUGH INGREDIENT FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN
settings.title: 5Beta-Scymnol
settings.text: Through the use of biotechnology, The Skin Shark have spent the last decade creating our patented ingredient, 5Beta-Scymnol. A 100% man-made marine salt-complex that dives deep to normalise oil production and stops blemishes in their tracks.

settings.title: join the $customer$ to fight acne once and for all
You’re not alone in this journey!
